serverDescription: Zendesk Help Center API MCP Tool Server

toolDescriptions.zendesk_list_categories: Retrieves a list of categories from Zendesk Help Center.
toolDescriptions.zendesk_list_sections_in_category: Retrieves a list of sections under a specific category ID in Zendesk Help Center.
toolDescriptions.zendesk_get_articles_in_category: Retrieves a list of articles under a specific category ID in Zendesk Help Center.
toolDescriptions.zendesk_get_articles_in_section: Retrieves a list of articles under a specific section ID in Zendesk Help Center.
toolDescriptions.zendesk_search_articles: Searches articles in Zendesk Help Center by keywords. Specify search keywords in 'query'.
toolDescriptions.zendesk_get_article: Retrieves article details from Zendesk Help Center by article ID. Specify the article ID in 'id'. Locale can also be specified.
